sources.title: Maddalena, Zero for Conduct (1940) Colorized Movie | Italian Comedy | Subtitled
sources.description:
A teacher writes sample letters to a fictional Mr. Hartman with her students, but the recipient really exists.

Original title: Maddalena... zero in condotta (1940)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/rBiNn3f63o8

Director: Vittorio De Sica
Writers: Ferruccio Biancini, Aldo De Benedetti, Vittorio De Sica
Stars: Vittorio De Sica, Vera Bergman, Carla Del Poggio
Genre: Colorized classics, Italian cinema, Comedy

@CultCinemaClassics:
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics 
https://www.tiktok.com/@cultcinemaclassics
https://www.instagram.com/cultcinemaclassics

metadata.Plot: Elisa, a young teacher, writes romantic letters to Mr. Hartman, an imaginary character found in a textbook. Maddalena, one of the students, finds a letter and sends it to the recipient. After a while, the real Mr. Hartman shows up at school.
metadata.Writer: Ferruccio Biancini, Aldo De Benedetti, Vittorio De Sica
metadata.Actors: Vittorio De Sica, Vera Bergman, Carla Del Poggio
